Groups and singers as young as 12 years can audition for the series, which will premiere in the fall. Unlike "American Idol," "The X Factor" does not have an upper age limit. I like the idea that a 12-year-old on this show can compete with an older singer and a singing group, said Simon Cowell , the former "American Idol" who will be a judge and an executive producer on "The X Factor." "I've never believed there should be a cut-off age for talent."
